participant_1.name: Oliver
participant_1.personality: Creative and nurturing, loves sharing knowledge.
participant_1.background: I like to cook with food I grow in my garden. I play many instruments. I like to travel. I give lessons on string instruments.

participant_2.name: Chloe
participant_2.personality: Curious and enthusiastic, eager to make new friends.
participant_2.background: I am in 3rd grade. I like to play soccer, draw, and read Asterix. I am a French girl, but I moved to the US last year. I live with my parents and my little brother. I don't have too many friends in the US yet, but I am going to summer camp and I hope to make friends then! I also think that I may make friends at soccer in the fall.

content.text: Hi there!
Hi!
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play soccer, draw, and read Asterix.
Asterix is a great comic book! I love the little Gauls.
Me too! I'm glad someone else has heard of it. I've read all of the books and seen all of the movies.
I've only seen a few of the movies, but I really enjoyed them.
You should read the books too! They're even better than the movies.
I'll have to check them out.
You won't regret it!
I'm sure I won't.
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to cook, travel, and play music.
I love to cook too! I'm trying to learn how to make my own pasta.
That's a great skill to have! I can't cook pasta to save my life.
It's not that hard, once you get the hang of it.
I'll have to give it a try.
You should! I'm sure you'll be a natural.
Thanks!
No problem!
